snippet: A loan agreement signed by the Walker Street building’s owner resulted in foreclosure proceedings, and the entity that owns it has declared bankruptcy.
abstract: International News Net World Report, activist television news organization in TriBeCa, has suspended operations because building in which it rents studio space is in foreclosure; activist and community organizer Lenny Charles Labanco, who founded the media organization nearly 10 years ago, says he will not resume programming until the future of the facility is secure.
lead_paragraph: A loan agreement signed by the Walker Street building’s owner resulted in foreclosure proceedings, and the entity that owns it has declared bankruptcy.

headline.seo: Loan Gone Sour Clouds Future of a Media Activists’ Haven in TriBeCa
headline.main: Loan Gone Sour Clouds the Future of a Media Activists’ Haven in TriBeCa
headline.print_headline: Loan Gone Sour Clouds the Future of a Media Activists’ Haven in TriBeCa
